programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: A local sheriff is unjustly accused of murder in a small town and forced to flee.

programme.title: Don't Wait, Django... Shoot!
programme.desc: Django returns home to discover that his father has been killed by local bandits in a business deal gone wrong.

programme.title: Buddy Goes West
programme.desc: Two outlaws, "The Doctor" and the Indian Girolamo, help a village fight a gang and a corrupt sheriff who has discovered gold beneath the town.

programme.title: Reverend's Colt
programme.desc: Reverend Miller arrives in Tucson where he wants to build a church, but on the very day of his arrival a gang raids the bank and the people of Tucson, suspicious of the new reverend because he is carrying a gun, immediately blame him for the robbery.

programme.title: Gentleman Killer
programme.desc: A border town is thrust into political chaos when a Mexican bandit targets US soldiers, killing them relentlessly. As tensions escalate between the US and Mexico, the bandit becomes a symbol of defiance. The town becomes a battleground, with both sides caught in a dangerous game of revenge and retaliation.

programme.title: Payment in Blood
programme.desc: In 1867 Texas, after the Civil War, Colonel Thomas Blake and his men refuse to surrender, raiding Yankee towns. Rumors swirl that Blake kills for pleasure, not the Confederacy, leading to large bounties for his capture. However, Blake seeks $200,000 that vanished during the war from Confederate coffers. He sends Chamaco Gonzales to track down the missing fortune, hidden in General Beauregard's strong box.

programme.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
programme.desc: The Winchester Does Not Forgive - When the stagecoach in which they travel is attacked by Monteiro's gang, Lash accepts to kill his friend to save his bacon.

programme.title: Ride in the Whirlwind
programme.desc: Three cowboys, mistaken for members of an outlaw gang, are relentlessly pursued by a posse.

programme.title: Twice a Judas
programme.desc: After waking up with amnesia in the desert next to a dead man, Luke Barrett begins piecing together his past. A stranger in black reveals that Luke was hired to kill his own brother, Victor Barrett, a wealthy landowner. As Luke seeks the truth, a deadly confrontation looms, and his memory recovery brings both clarity and danger.

programme.title: Django... Adios!
programme.desc: A gunfighter forms a gang of "deceased" execution victims to get revenge on the politician and outlaw who killed his wife.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Pistol for a Hundred Coffins
programme.desc: A Civil War veteran swears revenge when he returns home to find his family killed by a local gang.

programme.title: I'll Die for Vengeance
programme.desc: A Mexican gang headed by vicious Pedro terrorizes the land between New Mexico and Arizona.

programme.title: The Restless Breed
programme.desc: After Mitch Bakerâ€™s father is killed by gun-runners, he follows them to Mexico for revenge. In the border town of Mission, Texas, Mitch faces off with gang leader Jim Simmons, determined to take justice into his own hands, despite warnings from the sheriff.

programme.title: White Apache
programme.desc: Outlaws attack a band of settlers and kill everyone except a pregnant woman who's rescued by a band of Indians. The woman dies giving birth but Chief White Bear adopts her male baby, naming him "Shining Sky," and raising him as brother to his own son, Black Wolf.
